verbs.description: [ARG0: A New York Times report] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: said] [ARG1: President Donald Trump had privately revived his doubts over the authenticity of Barack Obama 's birth certificate] .
A New York Times report on Tuesday said President Donald Trump [V: had] privately revived his doubts over the authenticity of Barack Obama 's birth certificate .
